data.Name: Barenaked Ladies
data.Bio: Barenaked Ladies (often abbreviated BNL) is a Canadian alternative rock band currently composed of Jim Creeggan, Kevin Hearn, Ed Robertson, and Tyler Stewart, formerly featuring Andy Creeggan and Steven Page. Page left the band amicably in February 2009 to pursue solo projects, and March 7th, 2009 saw the band's first show on stage as a foursome in Orlando, Florida. Tyler Stewart proudly emblazoned his drum-set with a "Fantastic 4" logo. In March 2010, they released 'All In Good Time', their first post-Page studio album. Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: Barenaked Ladies
data.Subtitle: with Gin Blossoms, Toad the Wet Sprocket
data.Description:
BARENAKED LADIES at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on June 22, 2021 has been rescheduled to June 21, 2022.

There is nothing you need to do as your tickets will be valid for the new date.

 

AEG Presents is thrilled to announce BARENAKED LADIES live at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on Tuesday, June 21, 2022.
